doc:
Simon Gipps-Kent https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Simon_Gipps-Kent 0 Simon Gipps-Kent (born Simon Trevor Kent; 25 October 1958 – 16 September 1987) was a prolific 20th-century English theatre and film actor in the 1970s-80s, noted for his teen portrayals of British royalty and nobility. He was born into a show business family in Kensington, London. His television debut was on the BBC in 1971 followed with a London West End theatre debut in 1972. A 16-year career in both venues continued until his death in 1987. Simon_Gipps-Kent ( born Simon_Trevor_Kent ; 25_October_1958 – 16_September_1987 ) was a_prolific_20th-century_English_theatre_and_film_actor in the_1970s-80s , noted for his_teen_portrayals of British_royalty_and_nobility . He was_born into a_show_business_family in Kensington , London . His_television_debut was on the_BBC in 1971 followed with a_London_West_End_theatre_debut in 1972 . A_16-year_career in both venues continued until his_death in 1987 .
